SENT.plain: Sturge-Weber syndrome is a congenital disorder characterized by vascular facial birthmarks and neurological abnormalities
Oral cavity involvement may occur, and the extent of the vascular abnormality may vary considerably
The present authors report the case of a 6-year-old girl with Sturge-Weber syndrome, focusing on the clinical and radiographic features
Her dental management involved a multidisciplinary team and included orthodontic treatment using removable appliances
